page.title: 11VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: It takes about five minutes to get to Thorne from the centre of Yeovil by car.There aren't any activities in Thorne for children but there are some in Yeovil. Yeovil's main activities are Carnaby's, a fortnightly disco, for the under eighteens, an indoor swimming pool, a three screen cinema, the ammusement arcades and some small youth clubs. There are also Boy Scouts Brownies, Girl Guides and Boy's Brigade clubs. At the moment in Thorne only a small percentage of the population are children. The village Hall is sometimes used for parties and discos; it costs five pounds to hire the hall.
